Activity: Review the previous day's progress and prioritize tasks for the day.
Check emails and respond to any urgent queries.
Meet with @helpdesk-1 to discuss any user-reported issues with the EHR system and ensure they are being addressed.
Coordinate with @mrs-2 and @his-1 to ensure all medical records are being accurately captured in the EHR system.
Prepare a presentation for the weekly stakeholder meeting, highlighting key progress and challenges.
Conduct the weekly stakeholder meeting with @clinlead-1, @pchmp-1, @ehrv-1, and other key stakeholders to discuss project updates.
Follow up on action items from the stakeholder meeting and assign tasks to relevant team members.
Review the influenza trend analysis data with @da-1 and @da-2 to ensure it aligns with seasonal expectations.
Update the project plan and timeline based on feedback from the stakeholder meeting.
